value:
$WmMPID_愛の祭カザハナ,ch05_02_Kazahana_F_Valentine23,Face|Lady Sakura! There you are!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭エルフィ,ch05_20_Elfi_F_Valentine23,Face|Oh, Lady Elise! I was so worried...$k$p$WmMPID_比翼エリーゼ_v7.2,ch05_25_Elise_FF_Pair,Face|Oh, hi, Effie! And I see Leo's here
as well.$k$p$nMPID_サクラ|I-is something the matter?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭タクミ,ch05_09_Takumi_M_Valentine23,Face|You tell us! Your retainers were
looking everywhere for you, and
they recruited us to help search.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭レオン,ch05_24_Leon_M_Valentine23,Face|So what is it you two are doing all
the way out here? Don't tell me...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_比翼エリーゼ_v7.2,ch05_25_Elise_FF_Pair,Face|Finally finished getting through that
long line of people delivering gifts,
$Nu?$k$p$nMPID_サクラ|Looks like we're the last ones...$k$p$nMPID_比翼エリーゼ_v7.2|You may be tired, but not so tired
you'll refuse one last gift, right?$k$pSakura and I put something
special together, just for you...
Are you ready?!$k$p...Ta-da!$k$p$nMPID_サクラ|Th-this is a koto. It's an instrument
from Hoshido.$k$pAnd Elise has a violin from Nohr.$k$p$nMPID_比翼エリーゼ_v7.2|The two can create wonderful
harmonies when played as a duet!$k$pWe wanted to give you something
special that only we could give,
$Nu.$k$pIt wasn't easy smuggling these
instruments here either... People
are so nosy!$k$p$nMPID_サクラ|When they found out we were going
to put on a performance, they told
us to do our best though!$k$pI've heard music can be restorative,
so we just thought, er...$k$pThank you for listening to us play!
...Is what I'm trying to say.$k$p$nMPID_比翼エリーゼ_v7.2|We're going to play our hearts
out for you, so give us your full
attention, all right?$k$p...Now, just like we practiced,
Princess Sakura.$k$p$nMPID_サクラ|R-right! I'm ready!$k$p$Sbs150|
